name: bundle-analyser-ci
description: azure pipeline bundle analyser for create react app

scripts.buildTaskV0: rimraf .bin && tsc -b . && NODE_ENV=production && npm run cpyAssets && copyfiles -f ./src/tasks/bundle-analyzerV0/task.json package.json ./.bin/task
scripts.buildTaskV1: rimraf .bin && tsc -b . && NODE_ENV=production && npm run cpyAssets && copyfiles -f ./src/tasks/bundle-analyzerV1/task.json package.json ./.bin/task
scripts.packTaskV0: NODE_ENV=prod npm run buildTaskV0 && copyfiles vss-extension.json vss-extension-icon.jpg LICENSE.md README.md ./.bin && loop "npm install --only=prod" --cwd ./.bin/task
scripts.packTaskV1: NODE_ENV=prod npm run buildTaskV1 && copyfiles vss-extension.json vss-extension-icon.jpg LICENSE.md README.md ./.bin && loop "npm install --only=prod" --cwd ./.bin/task
